thread.title: Weekend headquarters for a quick visit
thread.title_full: Weekend headquarters for a quick visit - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 693royl
title: Weekend headquarters for a quick visit
text: The property was nice, a convenient location, and reasonably priced. The room (and especially the bathroom were smallish, but comfortable. If we were staying again (and longer) I might investigate other room options for a little more space or view ( the bricked up window of the property of the building across the alley was not that picturesque.
